table.name: vtiger_emailtrackingreport
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_emailtrackingreport` ( `emailtrackingreportid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `emailtrackingreport1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `parent_id` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `emailid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `emailcampaignsid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `email_open` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `email_click` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_emailtrackingreportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_emailtrackingreportcf` ( `emailtrackingreportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emailtrackingreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
